name: Fidelity Macro Analyst: Bitcoin Might Take a ‘Year off’ in 2026
description: The saint kneels before the stalled clockwork heart, its 4-year cycle arrested by crystallized calculation. Cyan data spikes freeze the gears of decaying brass. The mechanism sleeps, sealed in heavy fog and analog static, awaiting the tungsten thaw of the mandated stasis.
